column1: '''Graham McTavish''' (born [[1961]]) is a Scottish actor who has appeared in a variety of supporting roles in many television programmes, as well as being a prolific voice actor. He portrayed [[Dwalin]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)
column2: ''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].<ref>[http://www.comingsoon.net ComingSoon.net], "[http://www.comingsoon.net/news/movienews.php?id=71003 ''The Hobbit'' Casting Announced!]" dated 21 October 2010 (accessed 9 July 2011)</ref>
